bioconda.name: quicktree
bioconda.summary: Fast implementation of the neighbour-joining phylogenetic inference method.

biocontainers.name: quicktree
biocontainers.summary: Fast implementation of the neighbour-joining phylogenetic inference method

biotools.summary: QuickTree is an efficient implementation of the Neighbor-Joining algorithm (PMID: 3447015), capable of reconstructing phylogenies from huge alignments in time less than the age of the universe.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: QuickTree is an efficient implementation of the Neighbor-Joining algorithm (PMID: 3447015), capable of reconstructing phylogenies from huge alignments in time less than the age of the universe.
